title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
**Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush**

Elevate your oral hygiene routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush. Designed with innovative technology and user-friendly features, this rechargeable electric toothbrush ensures a superior clean with the convenience of modern dental care.

**Product Details:**

- **Model Number**: HX3681/24
- **Type**: Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
- **Color**: Sleek Black
- **Plaque Removal Efficiency**: Up to 3x more plaque removed compared to a manual toothbrush, ensuring a thorough clean every time.
- **Technology**: Sonicare's advanced sonic technology provides a month's worth of manual brushing in just 2 minutes.
- **Cleaning Time**: Standard 2-minute cleaning cycle to optimize your brushing routine.
- **Features**:
  - **Pressure Sensor**: Equipped with an indicator that flashes red to prevent gum recession and ensure gentle brushing.
  - **QuadPacer**: Signals the optimal time spent on each section of your mouth for an even clean.
  - **SmarTimer**: A built-in 2-minute timer to ensure you meet the dentist-recommended brushing time.
  - **Intensity Settings**: Two settings to customize your brushing experience.
  - **Design**: A slim ergonomic design with a familiar-shaped head for comfortable use and easy maneuvering.
- **Included Items**:
  - **Electric Toothbrush**: 1 Philips Sonicare 3100 series handle.
  - **Brush Head**: 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head for an effective and gentle cleaning.
  - **USB Charger**: Convenient charging with a USB cable (Note: wall adaptor not included).

**Transform your brushing experience with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, your partner in maintaining dental health with ease and efficiency.**

**Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (Model: HX3681/24)**

Elevate your oral hygiene with the sleek and powerful Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush. This advanced rechargeable electric toothbrush in classic black is designed to remove up to 3 times more plaque than a manual toothbrush, ensuring a deeper clean every time.

**Key Features:**

- **Sonicare Technology**: Experience the dynamic cleaning action that drives fluid between teeth, ensuring a thorough clean along the gumline and between teeth.
- **Plaque Removal Efficiency**: Clinically proven to remove up to 3x more plaque versus a manual toothbrush, promoting healthier gums.
- **Smart Features**: 
  - **Pressure Sensor**: An intelligent feature that flashes red to alert you if you're pressing too hard, helping prevent gum recession and ensuring a gentle clean.
  - **QuadPacer**: This feature signals the optimal time spent on each section of your mouth, ensuring an even and thorough clean.
  - **SmarTimer**: A built-in 2-minute timer ensures you meet the dentist-recommended brushing time.
  - **Intensity Settings**: Choose from 2 intensity settings to customize your brushing experience to your comfort level.
- **Design**: A slim ergonomic design with a head shape that's familiar, making it easy to maneuver and comfortable to hold.
- **Cleaning Time**: With just 2 minutes of brushing, you achieve the equivalent of a month's worth of manual brushing.

**What's Included:**

- 1 Philips Sonicare 4100 Electric Toothbrush (Model: HX3681/24)
- 1 SimplyClean (C1) Brush Head for an all-around clean
- 1 USB Charger (Please note: Wall adaptor is not included)

**Experience the Difference:**

Transition to a smarter, more effective brushing routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush. Its innovative features work together to ensure a sparkling clean, while the pressure sensor and timers aid in brushing with precision. Get ready to transform your daily oral care with a touch of modern technology.

Order your Philips Sonicare 4100 today and feel the confidence of a healthier, brighter smile!

**Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (Model: HX3681/24)**

Elevate your oral hygiene routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, designed to provide a superior clean with a touch of sophistication. Experience the perfect blend of form and function with this sleek black, rechargeable electric toothbrush.

**Product Features:**

- **Plaque Removal Efficiency:** Say goodbye to plaque with up to 3x more plaque removal efficiency compared to a manual toothbrush. The Philips Sonicare technology ensures a thorough clean every time.

- **Sonicare Technology:** Enjoy the benefits of high-speed vibrations that drive fluid deep between teeth, ensuring a powerful yet gentle cleaning action that reaches deep between teeth and along the gum line.

- **Brushing Experience:** Each brushing session lasts for 2 minutes, which is the dentist-recommended time, offering a month's worth of manual brushing in just 2 minutes.

- **Intelligent Design:** The slim ergonomic design is not just easy on the eyes but also offers a comfortable grip, while the familiar-shaped head makes transitioning from a manual to an electric toothbrush seamless.

- **Smart Features:**
  - **QuadPacer:** Notifies you when it's time to move to the next section of your mouth, ensuring even cleaning throughout.
  - **SmarTimer:** A built-in 2-minute timer helps you meet the recommended brushing time.
  - **Pressure Sensor:** An intelligent feature that flashes red to alert you when you're brushing too hard, helping to prevent gum recession.
  - **Intensity Settings:** Choose from 2 different settings to customize your brushing intensity for a comfortable experience.

**What's Included:**
- 1 Philips Sonicare 4100 Electric Toothbrush
- 1 SimplyClean (C1) Brush Head for an effective, yet gentle clean
- 1 USB Charger (Note: Wall adapter not included)

Transform your daily brushing with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush and enjoy a professional-level cleaning at home. The HX3681/24 model is your partner in maintaining dental health with ease and style. Add it to your cart today and take the first step towards a healthier, brighter smile!
